Student Report

Select Student : {{student.firstName + " " + student.lastName}} Select Student : {{student.firstName + " " + student.lastName}}
import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { classRoom, student, teacher } from '../_models/entityModels'; @Component({ selector: 'app-report', templateUrl: './report.component.html', styleUrls: ['./report.component.css'] }) export class ReportComponent implements OnInit { baseurl = "https://localhost:7217/api/" students : student[] | any; classRoom : classRoom | any; teachers : teacher[] | any; classRoomID : number | any ; selectedStudent : student | any; constructor(private http: HttpClient) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.getStudents(); this.getClassroom(); } getStudents(){ this.http.get(this.baseurl + 'student/').subscribe({ next : response => { this.students = response; console.log(response); }, error: () => console.log(console.error()), complete: () => console.log('Requse has Been Completed') }) } getClassroom(){ this.http.get(this.baseurl + 'classRoom/').subscribe({ next : response => { this.classRoom = response; this.teachers = this.classRoom.teachers; console.log(this.classRoom); console.log(this.teachers); }, error: () => console.log(console.error()), complete: () => console.log('Requse has Been Completed') }) } }
